text: Phetmuangchon Por.Suantong (เพชรเมืองชล ภ.สวนทอง) is a Thai former Muay Thai fighter. He is now a Muay Thai instructor at Evolve MMA in Singapore.https://evolve-mma.com/instructors/petmuangchon-por-suantong/ ==Titles and accomplishments== * S-1 105 lbs Champion * 2013 Rajadamnern Stadium 105 lbs Championhttps://titlehistories.com/kickboxing/as/tha/rajadamnern/rajadamnern- mfl.html * 2014 Rajadamnern Stadium 108 lbs Champion * 2015 Omnoi Stadium 112 lbs Champion * 2017 Sports Authority of Thailand Fighter of the Yearhttps://www.facebook.com/SiamFightNews/posts/811292139053891 ==Fight record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:100%;
